title: New Client End Game Stats Screen
body: At the top of the client at the end of the game there is a section that has  W#### L#### then the game time. What are these numbers referring to?

replies.body: Yup, as *Lew* mentioned, this sounds like your Wins and Losses for that game mode. You can [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing if you'd like me to 100% confirm this.
